title: Seramal Ponal Lyrics Gulebagavali
stanzas:
<div>
Here is Seramal Ponal Lyrics From Gulebagavali Movie. A beautiful melody , great feeling to here after a long time.

Seram Ponal Song is sung by Sameera Bharadwaj, Mervin Solomon and composed by Vivek-Merin.
Below is Seramal Ponal Lyrics  Mazhai pozhindhidum neram
oru kudaiyinil naamum
nadappathai edhirkaanum
kanavugal pizhaiyaa

varam ondru kodu podhum
kalavarangalum theerum
thanimaram ena naanum
iruppadhu muraiyaa

en thaaragai neethaanadi
kan vizhiyaal kollaathadi
thallaathadi kai viralaal

seraamal ponaal
vazhaamal poven
unnai kaanaamal
kaanaamaal poven
nee paarkaamal ponaal
paazhaagi povene naan
pen poove. (2)

nadu veyilil
kadal karaiyil
padagadiyil inaidhidavaa

nadu iravil
adai mazhaiyil
saalai vazhiyil ninaidhidavaa

jannal vazhiyil
minnal pugundha
nodigalilum ninaidhidavaa

kattil araiyil kaalai varaiyil
porvai siraiyil ninaindhidavaa

nee indri naanum
naan  indri neeyum
vazhum vazhkai ennadaa
anbae neeyum solladaa

neerindri vaanum
vaanindri neerum
irundhaal ulagam yaedhadi
penne purindhukolladi

seraamal ponaal
vazhaamal poven
unnai kaanaamal
kaanaamaal poven
nee paarkaamal ponaal
paazhaagi povene naan
yen anbae. (2)

seraamal ponaal
vazhaamal poven
unnai kaanaamal
kaanaamaal poven
nee paarkaamal ponaal
paazhaagi povene naan
pen poove. (2)
